Trigger.name: nature
Trigger.script: def.table.totems = { squirrel = true, night = true, skunk = true, sun = true, rock = true, moon = true, crow = true, tree = true, groundhog = true, trout = true, wolf = true, bear = true, stag = true, monkey = true, horse = true, river = true, snake = true }

regexCodeList.string: You call upon all the spirits of Nature, and a whirlwind of power surrounds you, briefly lifting you from the ground. As every spirit embraces you, you shudder and tremble in delight.
You call upon the spirit of squirrel to provide sustenance for you. You cannot stifle a giggle as you are tickled by tiny paws running over your skin.
You call upon the spirit of mother night to hide you. Her dark presence makes your skin crawl.
You call upon the spirit of skunk. You wrinkle your nose as his musky presence envelops you.
You call upon the spirit of sun and a warm ray of sunlight infuses you with confidence.
You call upon the spirit of the great rock to ground you to the earth, and you feel your feet become encased in clay.
You call upon the spirit of moon and a soft shaft of moonlight beams down upon you, filling you with power.
You call upon the spirit of crow and feel oily black feathers caress your skin, making you shudder.
You call upon the spirit of tree to heal you. A gentle breeze carries a rich and loamy scent which invigorates you.
You call upon the spirit of groundhog to grant you the gift of burrowing. Your nostrils fill with the scent of earth and a claw brushes your cheek gently.
You call upon the spirit of rainbow trout, and a fine spray of water cools your skin.
You call upon the spirit of wolf to give you courage. As the power of Wolf infuses you, you let out a howl of the wild.
You call upon the spirit of bear and feel a powerful rush of strength course through your veins. You let loose a vigorous roar of exhilaration.
You call upon the spirit of stag and your scalp itches as invisible antlers sprout from your head.
You call upon the spirit of monkey and surrender yourself to a sudden urge to drag your knuckles on the ground and whoop.
You call upon the spirit of horse and an electrifying surge of energy ripples through your legs, forcing you to neigh loudly.
You call upon the spirit of the river daughter and laugh joyously as water swirls over your body.
You call upon the spirit of snake and feel cool silky coils winding over your skin.

Trigger.name: new skill
Trigger.script: local stuff = yajl.to_string({group=matches[2]}) local string = "Char.Skills.Get "..stuff.."" sendGMCP(string) gagPrompt = true send("\n", false) local primary = {"Cosmic","Elementalism","Nature","Music","Kata","Knighthood",} if table.contains(primary, matches[2]) then tempTimer(2, [[def.archetype()]]) end

Script.name: defs

ScriptGroup.name: Primary
ScriptGroup.script: --Aquachemantics, Wildewood --Transmology needs more fleshform lines --Harmonics crystalplex needs testing

Script.name: Nature
Script.script: function def.nature() cecho("\n<green>Nature") if def.skills.wicca then cecho("<green> (Wicca)") elseif def.skills.druid then cecho("<green> (Druidry)") elseif def.skills.wildewood then cecho("<green> (Wildewood)") end cecho("<green>:") def.num = 3 if table.contains(def.skills.nature, "Blend") then if def.table.nature.blend then def.yes("Blend") else def.no("Blend") end end if table.contains(def.skills.nature, "Barkskin") then if def.table.nature.barkskin then def.yes("Barkskin") else def.no("Barkskin") end end if table.contains(def.skills.nature, "Rooting") then if def.table.nature.rooting then def.yes("Rooting") else def.no("Rooting") end end if def.skills.wicca then def.wicca() elseif def.skills.druidry then def.druid() elseif def.skills.wildewood then def.wildewood() end end

Script.name: Wicca
Script.script:
function def.wicca() if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Snoefaasia") then if def.table.wicca.snoe then def.yes("Snoefaasia") else def.no("Snoefaasia") end end
if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Leprechaun") then if def.table.wicca.leprechaun then def.yes("Leprechaun") else def.no("Leprechaun") end end if def.skills.moon then if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Bluebell") then if def.table.wicca.bluebell then def.yes("Bluebell") else def.no("Bluebell") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Maiden") then if def.table.other.purity and def.table.other.constitution and def.table.other.resistance and def.table.other.fitness then def.yes("Maiden") def.table.other.purity = nil def.table.other.consitution = nil def.table.other.resistance = nil def.table.other.fitness = nil else def.no("Maiden") end end end if def.skills.night then if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Foxglove") then if def.table.wicca.foxglove then def.yes("Foxglove") else def.no("Foxglove") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Barghest") then if def.table.wicca.barghest then def.yes("Barghest") else def.no("Barghest") end end end if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Brownie") then if def.table.wicca.brownie then def.yes("Brownie") else def.no("Brownie") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Sylph") then if def.table.wicca.sylph then def.yes("Sylph") else def.no("Sylph") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Pigwidgeon") then if def.table.wicca. pigwidgeon then def.yes("Pigwidgeon") else def.no("Pigwidgeon") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Sprite") then if def.table.wicca.sprite then def.yes("Sprite") else def.no("Sprite") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Channels") then if def.table.other.channels then def.yes("Channels") else def.no("Channels") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Pixie") then if def.table.wicca.pixie then def.yes("Pixie") else def.no("Pixie") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Nymph") then if def.table.wicca.nymph then def.yes("Nymph") else def.no("Nymph") end end if def.skills.moon then if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Mother") then if def.table.wicca.mother then def.yes("Mother") else def.no("Mother") end end end if def.skills.night then if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Redcap") then if def.table.wicca.redcap then def.yes("Redcap") else def.no("Redcap") end end end if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Banshee") then if def.table.wicca.banshee then def.yes("Banshee") else def.no("Banshee") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Willowisp") then if def.table.wicca.willowisp then def.yes("Willowisp") else def.no("Willowisp") end end if def.skills.moon then if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Crone") then if def.table.wicca.crone then def.yes("Crone") else def.no("Crone") end end end if def.skills.night then if table.contains(def.skills.wicca, "Slaugh") then if def.table.wicca.slaugh then def.yes("Slaugh") else def.no("Slaugh") end end end end

Script.name: Druidry
Wildewood
Script.script: function def.wildewood() if table.contains(def.skills.wildewood, "Iron") then if def.table.wildewood.ironbark then def.yes("Iron Bark ("..def.table.wildewood.ironbark.." mo)") else def.no("Iron Bark") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wildewood, "Knobbled") then if def.table.wildewood.knobbled then def.yes("Knobbled Branches ("..def.table.wildewood.knobbled.." mo)") else def.no("Knobbled Branches") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wildewood, "Evergreen") then if def.table.wildewood.evergreenbark then def.yes("Evergreen Bark ("..def.table.wildewood.evergreenbark.." mo)") else def.no("Evergreen Bark") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wildewood, "Moonhart") then if def.table.wildewood.moonhartbark then def.yes("Moonhart Bark ("..def.table.wildewood.moonhartbark.." mo)") else def.no("Moonhart Bark") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wildewood, "Gossamer") then if def.table.wildewood.gossamer then def.yes("Gossamer Branches ("..def.table.wildewood.gossamer.." mo)") else def.no("Gossamer Branches") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wildewood, "lead") then if def.table.wildewood.leadbark then def.yes("Lead Bark ("..def.table.wildewood.leadbark.." mo)") else def.no("Lead Bark") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wildewood, "Flowering") then if def.table.wildewood.flowering then def.yes("Flowering Branches ("..def.table.wildewood.flowering.." mo)") else def.no("Flowering Branches") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wildewood, "Mossy") then if def.table.wildewood.mossy then def.yes("Mossy Branches ("..def.table.wildewood.mossy.." mo)") else def.no("Mossy Branches") end end if table.contains(def.skills.wildewood, "WildeCall") then if def.table.wildewood.wildecall then def.yes("Wildecall "..def.table.wildewood.wildecall) else def.no("Wildecall") end end end

Script.name: Elementalism
Script.script:
function def.element() cecho("\n<green>Elementalism") if def.skills.aquamancy then cecho("<green> (<blue>Aquamancy<green>)") end if def.skills.geomancy then cecho("<green> (<firebrick>Geomancy<green>)") end if def.skills.pyromancy then cecho("<green> (<red>Pyromancy<green>)") end if def.skills.aeromancy then cecho("<green> (<white>Aeromancy<green>)") end if def.skills.aerochemantics then cecho("<green> (<white>Aerochemantics<green>)") end cecho("<green>:") def.num = 3 if table.contains(def.skills.elementalism, "Levitate") then if def.table.enchantments.levitate then def.yes("Levitate") else def.no("Levitate") end end if table.contains(def.skills.elementalism, "Stoneskin") then if def.table.element.stoneskin then def.yes("Stoneskin") else def.no("Stoneskin") end end if table.contains(def.skills.elementalism, "Waterbreathe") then if def.table.enchantments.waterbreathe then def.yes("Waterbreathe") else def.no("Waterbreathe") end end if table.contains(def.skills.elementalism, "Elementshield") then if def.table.element.shield then def.yes("Elementshield") else def.no("Elementshield") end end if def.skills.aeromancy then if table.contains(def.skills.aeromancy, "Windwalk") then if def.table.element.windwalk then def.yes("Windwalk") else def.no("Windwalk") end end end
if def.skills.aerochemantics then if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "WindWalk") then if def.table.element.windwalk then def.yes("Windwalk") else def.no("Windwalk") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Conductive") then if def.table.element.conductive then def.yes("Conductive ("..def.table.element.conductive..")") else def.no("Conductive") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Ionic") then if def.table.element.ionic then def.yes("Ionic Cloud ("..def.table.element.ionic..")") else def.no("Ionic Cloud") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Insulation") then if def.table.element.insul then def.yes("Insulation ("..def.table.element.insul..")") else def.no("Insulation") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Antigravity") then if def.table.element.antigrav then def.yes("Antigravity ("..def.table.element.antigrav..")") else def.no("Antigravity") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Dynomatic") then if def.table.element.dynomatic then def.yes("Dynomatic ("..def.table.element.dynomatic..")") else def.no("Dynomatic") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Force") then if def.table.element.force then def.yes("Force Generator ("..def.table.element.force..")") else def.no("Force Generator") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Electromagnetic") then if def.table.element.electromagnetic then def.yes("Electromagnetic ("..def.table.element.electromagnetic..")") else def.no("Electromagnetic") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Positronic") then if def.table.element.positronic then def.yes("Positronic ("..def.table.element.positronic..")") else def.no("Positronic") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Stratus") then def.chemantics() end end
if def.skills.aquamancy then if table.contains(def.skills.aquamancy, "Staff") then if def.table.element.watershield then def.yes("Watershield") else def.no("Watershield") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aquamancy, "Whirlpool") then if def.table.element.whirlpool then def.yes("Whirlpool") else def.no("Whirlpool") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aquamancy, "LiquidForm") then if def.table.element.liquidform then def.yes("Liquid Form") else def.no("Liquid Form") end end end
if def.skills.geomancy then if table.contains(def.skills.geomancy, "Staff") then if def.table.element.attune then def.yes("Attune") else def.no("Attune") end end end
if def.skills.pyromancy then if table.contains(def.skills.pyromancy, "Fireproof") then if def.table.element.fireproof then def.yes("Fireproof") else def.no("Fireproof") end end if table.contains(def.skills.pyromancy, "Flamering") then if def.table.element.flamering then def.yes("Flamering") else def.no("Flamering") end end end
end

Script.name: Chemantics
Script.script:
function def.chemantics()
if def.skills.aerochemantics then if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Stratus") then cecho("<green>\nAerochemantic Fields") if def.table.chemantics.target then cecho("<green> (<white>"..def.table.chemantics.target.."<green>)") end cecho("<green>:") def.num = 3 if def.table.chemantics.field.stratus then def.yes("Stratus ("..def.table.chemantics.field.stratus.." mins)") else def.no("Stratus") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Cirrus") then if def.table.chemantics.field.cirrus then def.yes("Cirrus ("..def.table.chemantics.field.cirrus.." mins)") else def.no("Cirrus") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Cumulus") then if def.table.chemantics.field.cumulus then def.yes("Cumulus ("..def.table.chemantics.field.cumulus.." mins)") else def.no("Cumulus") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Altostratus") then if def.table.chemantics.field.altostratus then def.yes("Altostratus ("..def.table.chemantics.field.altostratus.." mins)") else def.no("Altostratus") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Static") then if def.table.chemantics.field.static then def.yes("Static Field ("..def.table.chemantics.field.static.." mins)") elseif def.table.chemantics.field.staticd then def.dormant("Static Field ("..def.table.chemantics.field.staticd.." mins)") else def.no("Static Field") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aerochemantics, "Amplify") then if def.table.chemantics.amplify then def.yes("Amplified") else def.no("Amplified") end end elseif def.skills.aquachemantics then if table.contains(def.skills.aquachemantics, "Pellucid") then cecho("<green>\nAquachemantic Mists:") def.num = 3 if def.table.chemantics.pellucid then def.yes("Pellucid ("..def.table.chemantics.pellucid..")") else def.no("Pellucid") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aquachemantics, "Humid") then if def.table.chemantics.humid then def.yes("Humid ("..def.table.chemantics.humid..")") else def.no("Humid") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aquachemantics, "Bubbling") then if def.table.chemantics.bubbling then def.yes("Bubbling ("..def.table.chemantics.bubbling..")") else def.no("Bubbling") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aquachemantics, "Luminated") then if def.table.chemantics.luminated then def.yes("Luminated ("..def.table.chemantics.luminated..")") else def.no("Luminated") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aquachemantics, "Novamist") then if def.table.chemantics.novamist then def.yes("Novamist ("..def.table.chemantics.novamist..")") else def.no("Novamist") end end end if def.skills.wildewood then if table.contains(def.skills.aquachemantics, "BlueBell") then if def.table.chemantics.bluebell then def.yes("Bluebell ("..def.table.chemantics.bluebell..")") else def.no("Bluebell") end end end end
function def.chemTimer() if not def.table.chemantics or def.table.chemantics.field == {} then return end for k, v in pairs(def.table.chemantics.field) do def.table.chemantics.field[k] = v - 1 if def.table.chemantics.field[k] == 0 then table.remove(def.table.chemantics.field, k) end end killTimer(chemTimer) if def.table.chemantics.field ~= {} then chemTimer = tempTimer(60, [[def.chemTimer()]]) end
end

Script.name: Cosmic
Script.script: function def.cosmic() cecho("\n<green>Cosmic") if def.skills.celestialism then cecho("<green> (<white>Celestialism<green>)") end if def.skills.nihilism then cecho("<green> (<firebrick>Nihilism<green>)") end if def.skills.transmology then cecho("<green> (<orange>Transmology<green>)") end if def.skills.harmonics then cecho("<green> (<yellow>Harmonics<green>)") end cecho("<green>:") def.num = 3 if table.contains(def.skills.cosmic, "Waterwalk") then if def.table.enchantments.waterwalk then def.yes("Waterwalk") else def.no("Waterwalk") end end if table.contains(def.skills.cosmic, "Deathsight") then if def.table.enchantments.deathsight then def.yes("Deathsight") else def.no("Deathsight") end end if table.contains(def.skills.cosmic, "SoulGuard") then if def.table.cosmic.soulguard then def.yes("Soul Guard") else def.no("Soul Guard") end end if table.contains(def.skills.cosmic, "Cloak") then if def.table.cosmic.cloak then def.yes("Cloak") else def.no("Cloak") end end if table.contains(def.skills.cosmic, "Timeslip") then if def.table.cosmic.timeslip then def.yes("Timeslip") else def.no("Timeslip") end end if table.contains(def.skills.cosmic, "Nimbus") then if def.table.enchantments.nimbus then def.yes("Nimbus") else def.no("Nimbus") end end if table.contains(def.skills.cosmic, "Quickening") then if def.table.cosmic.quick then def.yes("Quickening") else def.no("Quickening") end end if def.skills.celestialism then if table.contains(def.skills.celestialism, "Wings") then if def.table.cosmic.wings then def.yes("Angel Wings") else def.no("Angel Wings") end end if table.contains(def.skills.celestialism, "Halo") then if def.table.cosmic.halo then def.yes("Halo") else def.no("Halo") end end if table.contains(def.skills.celestialism, "Channels") then if def.table.other.channels then def.yes("Channels") else def.no("Channels") end end if table.contains(def.skills.celestialism, "Stigmata") then if def.table.cosmic.stigmata then def.yes("Stigmata") else def.no("Stigmata") end end end if def.skills.nihilism then if table.contains(def.skills.nihilism, "Wings") then if def.table.cosmic.wings then def.yes("Demon Wings") else def.no("Demon Wings") end end if table.contains(def.skills.nihilism, "Demonscales") then if def.table.cosmic.scales then def.yes("Demonscales") else def.no("Demonscales") end end if table.contains(def.skills.nihilism, "Barbedtail") then if def.table.cosmic.tail then def.yes("Barbedtail") else def.no("Barbedtail") end end if table.contains(def.skills.nihilism, "Channels") then if def.table.other.channels then def.yes("Channels") else def.no("Channels") end end end if def.skills.transmology then if table.contains(def.skills.transmology, "FleshCloak") then if def.table.cosmic.entcloak then def.yes("Flesh Cloak") else def.no("Flesh Cloak") end end def.transm() end if def.skills.harmonics then def.harm() end end

Script.script:
function def.rituals() cecho("\n<green>Rituals") if def.skills.sacraments then cecho("<green> (<white>Sacraments<green>)") end if def.skills.necromancy then cecho("<green> (<firebrick>Necromancy<green>)") end if def.skills.paradigmatics then cecho("<green> (<orange>Paradigmatics<green>)") end if def.skills.aeonics then cecho("<green> (<yellow>Aeonics<green>:)") end cecho("<green>:") def.num = 3
if table.contains(def.skills.rituals, "Fortuna") then if def.table.ritual.fortuna then def.yes("Fortuna") else def.no("Fortuna") end end if table.contains(def.skills.rituals, "Draconis") then if def.table.ritual.draconis then def.yes("Draconis") else def.no("Draconis") end end if table.contains(def.skills.rituals, "Populus") then if def.table.ritual.populus then def.yes("Populus") else def.no("Populus") end end if table.contains(def.skills.rituals, "Acquisitio") then if def.table.enchantments.acquisitio then def.yes("Acquisitio") else def.no("Acquisitio") end end if table.contains(def.skills.rituals, "Rubeus") then if def.table.ritual.rubeus then def.yes("Rubeus") else def.no("Rubeus") end end
if def.table.construct.active then def.yes(def.table.construct.name) end
if def.skills.sacraments then if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Benediction") then if def.table.other.fitness and def.table.other.purity and def.table.other.constitution then def.yes("Benediction") def.table.other.fitness = nil def.table.other.purity = nil def.table.other.constitution = nil else def.no("Benediction") end end if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Fervor") then if def.table.ritual.fervor then def.yes("Fervor") else def.no("Fervor") end end if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Lustration") then if def.table.ritual.lustration then def.yes("Lustration") else def.no("Lustration") end end if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Ablution") then if def.table.ritual.ablution then def.yes("Ablution") else def.no("Ablution") end end if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Honour") then if def.table.ritual.honour then def.yes("Honour") else def.no("Honour") end end if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Numen") then if def.table.ritual.numen then def.yes("Numen") else def.no("Numen") end end if table.contains(def.skills.sacraments, "Trueheal") then if def.table.other.barrier then def.yes("Prismatic Barrier") else def.no("Prismatic Barrier") end end end if def.skills.necromancy then if table.contains(def.skills.necromancy, "Putrefaction") then if def.table.ritual.putrefaction then def.yes("Putrefaction") else def.no("Putrefaction") end end if table.contains(def.skills.necromancy, "Ghost") then if def.table.ritual.ghost then def.yes("Ghost") else def.no("Ghost") end end if table.contains(def.skills.necromancy, "Lichdom") then if def.table.ritual.seed then def.yes("Lich Seed") elseif def.table.ritual.lich then def.yes("Lichdom")
if def.table.ritual.cold then def.yes("Cold Aura") else def.no("Cold Aura") end else def.no("Lich Seed") end if def.table.construct.active then if def.table.construct.adroit then def.yes("Adroitness") else def.no("Adroitness") end if def.table.construct.bloodrage then def.yes("Bloodrage") else def.no("Bloodrage") end end end end
if def.skills.paradigmatics then if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "ChaoteSign") or def.table.construct.name == "Third Eye" then if def.table.ritual.chaotesign then def.yes("Chaote Sign") else def.no("Chaote Sign") end end if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "GoodLuck") then if def.table.ritual.goodluck then def.yes("Good Luck") else def.no("Good Luck") end end if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "Polarity") then if def.table.ritual.polarity then def.yes("Polarity") else def.no("Polarity") end end if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "Gnosis") then if def.table.ritual.gnosis then def.yes("Gnosis") else def.no("Gnosis") end end if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "Fusion") then if def.table.ritual.fusion then def.yes("Fusion") else def.no("Fusion") end end if table.contains(def.skills.paradigmatics, "Butterfly") or def.table.construct.name == "Third Eye" then if def.table.ritual.butterfly then def.yes("Butterfly") else def.no("Butterfly") end end end
if def.skills.aeonics then if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "MindClock") or def.table.construct.name == "Time Sense" then if def.table.ritual.mindclock then def.yes("Mind Clock") else def.no("Mind Clock") end end if def.table.construct == "Time Sense" then if deftable.construct.quick then def.yes("Quickening") else def.no("Quickening") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "Insight") then if def.table.ritual.insight then def.yes("Insight") else def.no("Insight") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "TimelessBody") then if def.table.ritual.timeless then def.yes("Timeless Body") else def.no("Timeless Body") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "Alacrity") then if def.table.ritual.alacrity then def.yes("Alacrity") else def.no("Alacrity") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "FutureGlimpse") then if def.table.ritual.glimpse then def.yes("Future Glimpse") else def.no("Future Glimpse") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "SwitchFate") then if def.table.ritual.fate then def.yes("Switch Fate") else def.no("Switch Fate") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "AeonField") then if def.table.ritual.aeonfield then def.yes("Aeon Field") else def.no("Aeon Field") end end if table.contains(def.skills.aeonics, "Foresight") then if def.table.ritual.foresight then def.yes("Foresight") else def.no("Foresight") end end end def.table.construct.active = false end

Script.name: Domoth Blessings
Script.script: function def.domoth() cecho("\n<green>Domoth Blessings:") def.num = 3 for type in pairs(def.table.domoth) do if #def.table.domoth[type] > 0 then for _, bless in pairs(def.table.domoth[type]) do if type == "Minor" and bless == "Chaos" then def.yes("Minor Chaos ("..def.table.domoth.Minor.Chaos..")") def.table.domoth.Minor.Chaos = nil else def.yes(type .. " " .. bless) end end end end end

Script.name: enchantments
other
Script.script:
function def.other() def.dramatics() cecho("\n<green>Other:") def.num = 3 if def.table.construct.active then def.construct() end if def.skills.dreamweaving and table.contains(def.skills.dreamweaving, "Control") then if def.table.other.control then def.yes("Control") else def.no("Control") end end --discernment if def.table.other.nightsight then def.yes("Nightsight") end if def.skills.cosmic and table.contains(def.skills.cosmic, "Deathsight") then echo("") elseif def.table.enchantments.deathsight then echo("") else if table.contains(def.skills.discernment, "Deathsense") then if def.table.other.deathsense then def.yes("Deathsense") else def.no("Deathsense") end end end if table.contains(def.skills.discernment, "Thirdeye") then if def.table.other.thirdeye then def.yes("Thirdeye") else def.no("Thirdeye") end end if table.contains(def.skills.discernment, "Lipread") then if def.table.other.lipread then def.yes("Lipread") else def.no("Lipread") end end if table.contains(def.skills.discernment, "Powermask") then if def.table.other.powermask then def.yes("Powermask") else def.no("Powermask") end end if table.contains(def.skills.discernment, "Aethersight") then if def.table.other.aethersight then def.yes("Aethersight") else def.no("Aethersight") end end --discipline
if table.contains(def.skills.discipline, "Insomnia") then if def.table.other.insomnia then def.yes("Insomnia") else def.no("Insomnia") end end if table.contains(def.skills.discipline, "Metawake") then if def.table.other.metawake then def.yes("Metawake") else def.no("Metawake") end end if table.contains(def.skills.discipline, "Selfishness") then if def.table.other.selfish then def.yes("Selfishness") else def.no("Selfishness") end end if table.contains(def.skills.discipline, "Obliviousness") then if def.table.other.oblivious then def.yes("Obliviousness") else def.no("Obliviousness") end end if table.contains(def.skills.discipline, "Breathing") then if def.table.other.breath then def.yes("Breathing") else def.no("Breathing") end end --environment if table.contains(def.skills.environment, "Attunement") then if def.table.other.attune then if gmcp.Room.Info.environment == def.table.other.attune then def.yes("Attuned to "..string.title(def.table.other.attune)) else def.dormant("Attuned to "..string.title(def.table.other.attune)) end if def.table.other.attune2 then if gmcp.Room.Info.environment == def.table.other.attune2 then def.yes("Attuned to "..string.title(def.table.other.attune2)) else def.dormant("Attuned to "..string.title(def.table.other.attune2)) end end def.table.other.attune = nil else def.no("Attunement") end end --combat if table.contains(def.skills.combat, "Stancing") then if def.table.other.stance then def.yes("Stance "..def.table.other.stance) else def.no("Combat Stance") end end --dramatics/influence if def.table.drama.charaura then def.yes("Charismatic Aura") end
def.consume() def.items() --other if def.table.other.phased then def.yes("Phased") end if def.table.other.mounted then def.yes("Mounted ("..def.table.other.mounted..")") end if def.table.other.flight then def.yes("Flying") end if def.table.other.healthbless and def.table.other.manabless and def.table.other.egobless then def.yes("Vitals Blessing") else if def.table.other.healthbless then def.yes("Health Blessing") end if def.table.other.manabless then def.yes("Mana Blessing") end if def.table.other.egobless then def.yes("Ego Blessing") end end if def.table.other.dhealthbless and def.table.other.dmanabless and def.table.other.degobless then def.yes("Divine Vitals Blessing") else if def.table.other.dhealthbless then def.yes("Divine Health Blessing") end if def.table.other.dmanabless then def.yes("Divine Mana Blessing") end if def.table.other.degobless then def.yes("Divine Ego Blessing") end end if def.table.other.bashdamage then def.yes("Bashing Damage <green>+"..def.table.other.bashdamage.."%") end if def.table.other.infdamage then def.yes("Influence Damage <green>+"..def.table.other.infdamage.."%") end if def.table.other.boost then def.yes("<green>"..def.table.other.boost.. "% <white>Experience Boost") end if def.table.other.cavalier then for i = 1, #def.table.other.cavalier, 2 do def.yes(def.table.other.cavalier[i].." Resist ("..def.table.other.cavalier[i+1]..")") end end if def.table.other.crotamine then def.yes("Crotamine Immunity") end if def.table.other.poisonimmune then def.yes(def.table.other.poisonimmune.." Immunity") end if def.table.other.planarbond then def.yes("Planarbond") end if def.table.other.covey then def.yes("Covey ("..def.table.other.covey..")") end --racial if def.table.other.enrage then def.yes("Enraged") end if def.table.other.innerserpent then def.yes("Inner Serpent ("..def.table.other.innerserpent..")") end if def.table.other.bask then def.yes("Basking") end --ascendent/demi: if def.table.other.ascendpres then def.yes("Ascendant Presence") end if def.table.other.divinefire then def.yes("Divine Fire") end if def.table.other.havoc then def.yes("Havoc Cry") end if def.table.other.jpresence then def.yes("Judicious Presence") end if def.table.other.fearaura then def.yes("Fear Aura") end if def.table.other.omniscient then def.yes("Omniscience") end --shrine powers if def.table.other.celerity then def.yes("Celerity") end if def.table.other.shrinecure then def.yes("Shrine Cure") end if def.table.other.shrineheal then def.yes("Shrine Heal") end if def.table.other.shrineprotect then def.yes("Shrine Protection") end if def.table.other.vendetta then def.yes("Shrine Vendetta") end if def.table.other.gravity then def.yes("Shrine Gravity") end --quests if def.table.other.illith then def.yes("Avatar of Illith") end if def.table.other.kephqueen then def.yes("Queen of Queens") end if def.table.other.dionamus then if def.day then def.yes("Spire of Dionamus") else def.dormant("Spire of Dionamus") end end --from other people's skills if def.table.other.teacher then def.yes("Teacher ("..def.table.other.teacher..")") end if def.table.other.stagsac then def.yes("Sacrifice ("..def.table.other.stagsac..")") end if def.table.other.purity and def.table.other.constitution and def.table.other.resistance and def.table.other.fitness then def.yes("Maiden") elseif def.table.other.fitness and def.table.other.purity and def.table.other.constitution then def.yes("Benediction") else if def.table.other.purity then def.yes("Purity") end if def.table.other.fitness then def.yes("Fitness") end if not def.skills.athletics then if def.table.other.constitution then def.yes("Constitution") end if def.table.other.resistance then def.yes("Resistance") end end end end

dramatics/influence
Script.script:
function def.dramatics() if def.table.drama.perform or def.table.drama.attitude or def.table.drama.review then cecho("\n<green>Influencing and Dramatics:") def.num = 3 if def.table.drama.perform then if def.table.drama.perform == "none" then def.yes("Performing") else def.yes("Role ("..def.table.drama.perform..")") end else def.no("Performing") end if def.skills.dramaturgy then if table.contains(def.skills.dramaturgy, "Etiquette") then if def.table.drama.etiquette then def.yes("Etiquette") else def.no("Etiquette") end end end
if def.table.consume.oil then def.yes(def.table.consume.oil.. " Oil") else def.no("Influencing Oil") end if table.contains(def.skills.dramatics, "Lawyerly") then if def.table.drama.attitude then def.yes(def.table.drama.attitude) end end if table.contains(def.skills.dramatics, "Drunkard") then if def.table.drama.actdrunk then def.yes("Drunkard") end if def.table.drama.sober then def.yes("Sober") end end if def.table.drama.genderbend then def.yes("Genderbending") end if def.table.drama.review then def.yes("Reviewing") end if def.table.drama.wound then def.yes("Wounded") end if table.contains(def.skills.influence, "CharismaticAura") then if def.table.drama.charaura then def.yes("Charismatic Aura") def.table.drama.charaura = nil else def.no("Charismatic Aura") end end if def.table.other.throne then def.yes("Throne Aura") end end end

Script.name: constructs
items
Archetype finder
collect skills
Script.script: function def.skills_create() def.skills = {} for num in pairs(gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups) do local stuff = yajl.to_string({group=gmcp.Char.Skills.Groups[num]["name"]}) local string = "Char.Skills.Get "..stuff.."" sendGMCP(string) gagPrompt = true end send("\n", false) tempTimer(2, [[def.archetype()]]) tempTimer(3, [[def.tables()]]) end

Script.name: skill_ab
Script.script: function skill_ab() local name = gmcp.Char.Skills.List.group def.skills[name] = gmcp.Char.Skills.List.list end

Script.name: create def tables
clear ents
Script.script:
function def.clearents() if def.skills.wicca then def.table.wicca = {} end if def.skills.transmology then def.table.transm.spix = nil def.table.transm.ribbachi = nil def.table.transm.sludgeworm = nil def.table.transm.morrible = nil def.table.transm.hekoskeri = nil def.table.transm.homunculus = nil end
end

Script.name: Utilities
Script.script: function def.hasAbility(skill, ability) skill = string.lower(skill) ability = string.title(ability) if not def.skills[skill] then return false elseif table.contains(def.skills[skill], ability) then return true else return false end end
